title: Warren Buffett
summary: Warren Edward Buffett (/ˈbʌfɪt/ BUFF-itt; born August 30, 1930)[2] is an American business magnate, investor, and philanthropist. He is currently the chairman and CEO of Berkshire Hathaway. He is considered one of the most successful investors in the world[3][4] and has a net worth of over $102.1 billion as of December 2021,[5] making him the world's tenth-wealthiest person.[5]
